Discover > Companies > Wooly Navigate to Overview About the company Funding and Investors Founders and Board of Directors Competitors and Alternates Investments and Acquisitions Reports Funding & Investors Competitors Landscape All Related Reports Wooly - Company Profile Last updated: March 28, 2025 Claim Profile Suggest Edits Linkedin Twitter Facebook Email Copy Url Request page removal Wooly - About the company Wooly is a seed company based in Lehi (United States), founded in 2015 by Scott Paul and James Davis . It operates as an Influencer and social marketing through customers . Wooly has raised $1.5M in funding . The company has 991 active competitors, including 209 funded and 110 that have exited . Its top competitor s include companies like Klaviyo , Rokt and Bango . Company Details Wooly provides solutions to brands to discover and engage their customers. Allows brands to segment customers and social followers based on demographics, job titles, interests, and social influence provides metrics on their interest and affinity level. It sends alerts to clients when influencers, executives, celebrities or VIPs buy or follow them. It collects data and integrates with Shopify, MailChimp, Instagram, YouTube, Twitter and Facebook. Clientele includes Exxon, Nomatic, Cotopaxi and Rubio's. Website wooly.com Social Key Metrics Founded Year 2015 Location Lehi, United States Stage Seed Total Funding $1.5M in 2 rounds Latest Funding Round Seed, Jul 09, 2020 , $495K Ranked 262 nd among 991 active competitors Wooly's funding and investors Wooly has raised a total funding of $1.5M over 2 round s . Its first funding round was on Dec 15, 2017 . Wooly has 2 institutional investor s including Album VC and Peterson Partners .
